title: Integrable Many-Body Systems of Calogero-Moser-Sutherland Type in High Dimension
abstract: A new series of integrable cases of the many-body problem in many-dimensional spaces is found. That series appears as a part of the larger series of integrable problems, which are in 1-1 correspondence with Krichever-Novikov algebras of affine type (that is with pairs each one consisting of some finite root system and some Riemann surface of finite genus with two marked points).
